xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/538600-Arrivederci Saigon 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tsb0pBhNp8s4ooMuKZIwbPpk6Ml.jpg In 1968, five young girls from Tuscany who dream about getting out of there receive an offer they can't refuse: a tour in the Far East as an all-girl band. They set off hoping for success, but find themselves in the middle of the Vietnam War. Fifty years later, Le Stars tell the story of their adventure amongst American soldiers, remote jungle bases and soul music. Arrivederci Saigon
